replies.body: I'm getting sick of these threads but that one was actually funny.{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

I really enjoy the meme itself, but I try to make sure they're actually decent if I make a thread out of it. It's just getting so overused...

https://i.imgflip.com/1jcd4p.gif

Only because people are subscribed to 
https://yt3.ggpht.com/-YKuLJvuFzIo/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAAAA/5spB3xmgJNI/s900-c-k-no-mo-rj-c0xffffff/photo.jpg
Which in itself is quickly becoming a meme. God, people who study memetics in the future are going to have a field day with this era.

"WHAT THE FUCK WERE THEY ON"
"I HAVE THE ANSWER"
"HVAT"
"[DIS](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dQw4w9WgXcQ)"
was gonna be mad if that wasn't a [Rickroll](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PfYnvDL0Qcw).
I hope you step on a lego :(
Well... but then I get flamed by enemy bots.

I'm sorry but.............. I got flamed while playing with bots, by carrying a team where 2 people in there were intentionally feeding (and then both of them kept flaming coz bots didn't kill me and i was taking turrets..)
they even made one party member to rage quit, which was sad since it was a new player
You weren't playing with enough bots.

You can't think that people are toxic in League
If you never play League in the first place.

#:^)

Enemy bots BM though.
They purposely walk in and out of outer mid turret range, tanking free shots until they get executed.
I've also seen Xin Zhao Bot at my exposed inhibitor spamming recall instead of ending game.
But props to the Garen Bot who painstakingly auto'd my inhibitor for a good 20 seconds, until I respawned. The same Garen Bot who managed to shut me down.

There's got to be some way to honor bots.
Or report them. Ryze Bot just afk's in base while charging up his tear with q's. He's definitely inting.

I mean, hey that's a concept
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HJHRpzQC2v8
